alert.note: Alert for Stark (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:33PM EDT until June 01 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR WESTERN STARK COUNTY... At 633 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Barberton to near Green to near Mount Eaton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Canton, Massillon, Green, North Canton, Hartville, Brewster, Navarre, Meyers Lake, Hills And Dales, Greentown, Perry Heights and Uniontown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
